person.name: Richard J. Maynes
person.description: Elder Richard J. Maynes was named a member of the Presidency of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on January 20, 2012. He was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy on March 31, 2001, and served in the Second Quorum of the Seventy beginning in April 1997.
